        WHERE [s].[HostToken] = @__token_0 OR [s].[UserToken] = @__token_0) THEN CAST(1 AS bit)
    ELSE CAST(0 AS bit)
END {"EventId":{"Id":20101,"Name":"Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Database.Command.CommandExecuted"},"ActionId":"05c29dc3-e4dc-4efc-a8ae-251f2a9fa99a","ActionName":"NoorCanvas.Controllers.HostController.CreateSessionWithTokens (NoorCanvas)","RequestId":"0HNFOGABKK1LG:00000008","RequestPath":"/api/host/create-session","ConnectionId":"0HNFOGABKK1LG"}
